targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("bytes"), $__interval) FROM "bandwidth" WHERE ("interface" = 'eth0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "direction" fill(linear)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes"), $__interval) FROM "bandwidth" WHERE ("interface" = 'br0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "direction" fill(linear)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes"), $__interval) FROM "bandwidth" WHERE ("interface" = 'eth1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "direction" fill(linear)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes"), $__interval) FROM "bandwidth" WHERE ("interface" = 'ath0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "direction" fill(linear)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes"), $__interval) FROM "bandwidth" WHERE ("interface" = 'ath1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "direction" fill(linear)
